definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: Growth is in one long flush, beginning in April.
sentences.chinese: 成長是一個長期齊平，從四月份開始。

sentences.english: It plans to increase fuel production by 4 percent in April to 10.54 million tons.
sentences.chinese: 並承諾在四月份提高產量4%至1054萬噸。

sentences.english: When flowers bloom into April, Luoyang became a sea of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每當到了百花怒放的四月份，洛陽就成了花的海洋。

sentences.english: Her term would have ended in April.
sentences.chinese: 她的學習將在這個四月份結束。

sentences.english: which you'll find out in April.
sentences.chinese: 你會在四月份查到結果。

sentences.english: April is a good time to go for an outing.
sentences.chinese: 四月份是踏春的好時候。

sentences.english: Bank loans fell 25 percent in May from April.
sentences.chinese: 四月份到五月份，銀行貸款下降了25%。

sentences.english: I started climbing when i was 14, which means around April of 96.
sentences.chinese: 我是在14歲時開始攀巖的，大約96年的四月份。

sentences.english: In April, he saved RM50 more than he saved in March.
sentences.chinese: 他四月份的儲蓄比三月份多RM50。

sentences.english: The government said it plans to re-submit the bill later in April.
sentences.chinese: 政府稱將會在四月份後重新提交該法案。

sentences.english: The deadline expired in April for the group to transform into BGF.
sentences.chinese: 該組織整編爲邊防衛隊的最後期限在四月份終止。

sentences.english: It was cold from Christmas until April.
sentences.chinese: 從聖誕節曲到四月份氣候不停是寒的。

sentences.english: It seems that we can catch the April shipment.
sentences.chinese: 看來我們能趕上四月份裝船。

sentences.english: Dorah will be four in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月份多拉就滿四歲了。

sentences.english: It reopened to former residents during Qingming, or tomb-sweeping day, in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月份的清明節期間，對原該縣百姓開放。

sentences.english: Security Council resolution. The Council's members approved the resolution in April.
sentences.chinese: 安理會成員國四月份通過了這項決議。

definition: start of month/early in the month
